Hi Alex,

Sorry i haven t understand your ask very well :)

reapeat the action of SOM 2 times. the output of the SOM ( after the =
2
times ) ll be an array of int , witch is the number of the BMU.

and this=

the state of e=
ach input ll be selected by that way. F.e : output of
som {3,5} then input =

en etc....

om
result {3,5} and from there whe know that is open door kitchen.

n if he say {0,0,1,0,1,0,1} we let s neat correct it for giving
